verses.verse: פְּתַ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> pe-Tach Open לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> le-va-Non O Lebanon דְּלָתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1817><s%> de-la-Tei-cha; thy doors וְתֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> ve-to-Chal may devour אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh that the fire בַּאֲרָזֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H730><s%> ba-'a-ra-Zei-cha. thy cedars

הֵילֵ֤ל <S%H3213><s%> hei-Lel Howl בְּרוֹשׁ֙ <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Vosh fir tree כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נָ֣פַל <S%H5307><s%> Na-fal is fallen אֶ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> 'E-rez, for the cedar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Because אַדִּרִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> 'ad-di-Rim because the mighty שֻׁדָּ֑דוּ <S%H7703><s%> shud-Da-du; are spoiled הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H3213><s%> hei-Li-lu howl אַלּוֹנֵ֣י <S%H437><s%> al-lo-Nei O ye oaks בָשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> va-Shan, of Bashan כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad is come down יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar for the forest; הַבָּצוּר hab-ba-tzur כהַבָּצִֽיר׃ <S%H1219><s%> hab-ba-Tzir. cut off ק

ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol [There is] a voice יִֽלְלַ֣ת <S%H3215><s%> yil-Lat of the howling הָרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im, of the shepherds כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <S%H7703><s%> shud-de-Dah is spoiled אַדַּרְתָּ֑ם <S%H155><s%> 'ad-dar-Tam; for their glory ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol a voice שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <S%H7581><s%> sha-'a-Gat of the roaring כְּפִירִ֔ים <S%H3715><s%> ke-fi-Rim, of young lions כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> shud-Dad is spoiled גְּא֥וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on for the pride הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. of Jordan ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; my God רְעֵ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> re-'Eh Feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon the flock הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <S%H2028><s%> ha-ha-re-Gah. of the slaughter

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who קֹנֵיהֶ֤ן <S%H7069><s%> ko-nei-Hen Whose possessors יַֽהֲרְגֻן֙ <S%H2026><s%> ya-har-Gun slay וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <S%H816><s%> ye'-Sha-mu, them and hold themselves not guilty וּמֹכְרֵיהֶ֣ן <S%H4376><s%> u-mo-che-rei-Hen and they that sell יֹאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar, them say בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [be] the LORD וַאעְשִׁ֑ר <S%H6238><s%> va'-Shir; for I am rich וְרֹ֣עֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H7462><s%> ve-Ro-'ei-Hem, and their own shepherds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יַחְמ֖וֹל <S%H2550><s%> yach-Mol pity עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hen. and

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will no אֶחְמ֥וֹל <S%H2550><s%> ech-Mol For I will no more pity ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מַמְצִ֣יא <S%H4672><s%> mam-Tzi but lo I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, the men אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- hand רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu into his neighbour's וּבְיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> u-ve-Yad and into the hand מַלְכּ֔וֹ <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ko, of his king וְכִתְּתוּ֙ <S%H3807><s%> ve-chit-te-Tu and they shall smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo will no אַצִּ֖יל <S%H5337><s%> 'atz-Tzil I will not deliver מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Dam. and out of their hand

וָֽאֶרְעֶה֙ <S%H7462><s%> va-'er-'Eh And I will feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon the flock הַֽהֲרֵגָ֔ה <S%H2028><s%> ha-ha-re-Gah, of slaughter לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen [even] you עֲנִיֵּ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-ni-Yei O poor הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon; of the flock וָאֶקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-kach- And I took לִ֞י <S%H99999><s%> li שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei unto me two מַקְל֗וֹת <S%H4731><s%> mak-Lot, staves לְאַחַ֞ד <S%H259><s%> le-'a-Chad the one קָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti I called נֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H5278><s%> no-'am Beauty וּלְאַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> u-le-'a-Chad and the other קָרָ֣אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti I called חֹֽבְלִ֔ים <S%H2256><s%> choe-Lim, band וָאֶרְעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> va-'er-'Eh and I fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon. the flock

וָאַכְחִ֛ד <S%H3582><s%> va-'ach-Chid also I cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet Three הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im shepherds בְּיֶ֣רַח <S%H3391><s%> be-Ye-rach month אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; in one וַתִּקְצַ֤ר <S%H7114><s%> vat-tik-Tzar lothed נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi and my soul בָּהֶ֔ם <S%H99999><s%> ba-Hem, וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- also נַפְשָׁ֖ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sham them and their soul בָּחֲלָ֥ה <S%H973><s%> ba-cha-Lah also abhorred בִֽי׃ <S%H99999><s%> Vi.

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar Then said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶרְעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> 'er-'Eh I I will not feed אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; הַמֵּתָ֣ה <S%H4191><s%> ham-me-Tah you that that dieth תָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut, let it die וְהַנִּכְחֶ֙דֶת֙ <S%H3582><s%> ve-han-nich-Che-det and that that is to be cut off תִּכָּחֵ֔ד <S%H3582><s%> tik-ka-Ched, let it be cut off וְהַ֨נִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <S%H7604><s%> ve-Han-nish-'a-Rot, and let the rest תֹּאכַ֕לְנָה <S%H398><s%> to-Chal-nah eat אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> be-Sar the flesh רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7468><s%> re-'u-Tah. of another

וָאֶקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach And I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַקְלִי֙ <S%H4731><s%> mak-Li my staff אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נֹ֔עַם <S%H5278><s%> No-'am, [even] Beauty וָאֶגְדַּ֖ע <S%H1438><s%> va-'eg-Da' and cut it asunder אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; לְהָפֵיר֙ <S%H6565><s%> le-ha-Feir that I might break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֖תִּי <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat-ti which I had made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim. with all the people

וַתֻּפַ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> vat-tu-Far And it was broken בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; me וַיֵּדְע֨וּ <S%H3045><s%> vai-ye-de-'U upon me knew כֵ֜ן <S%H3651><s%> chen and thus עֲנִיֵּ֤י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-ni-Yei and so the poor הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-tzoN of the flock הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> hash-sho-me-Rim that waited אֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- that it [was] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. I

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar And I said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If ט֧וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-nei-Chem unto them If ye think הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> ha-Vu give שְׂכָרִ֖י <S%H7939><s%> se-cha-Ri [me] my price וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֣א׀ <S%H3808><s%> lo not חֲדָ֑לוּ <S%H2308><s%> cha-Da-lu; and if not forbear וַיִּשְׁקְל֥וּ <S%H8254><s%> vai-yish-ke-Lu So they weighed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׂכָרִ֖י <S%H7939><s%> se-cha-Ri for my price שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. [pieces] of silver

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me הַשְׁלִיכֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7993><s%> hash-li-Che-hu unto me Cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer, it unto the potter אֶ֣דֶר <S%H145><s%> 'E-der a goodly הַיְקָ֔ר <S%H3366><s%> hay-Kar, price אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָקַ֖רְתִּי <S%H3365><s%> ya-Kar-ti that I was prised at מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Hem; and וָֽאֶקְחָה֙ <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Chah of them And I took שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim the thirty הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef, [pieces] of silver וָאַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> va-'ash-Lich and cast אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַיּוֹצֵֽר׃ <S%H3335><s%> hai-yo-Tzer. them to the potter

וָֽאֶגְדַּע֙ <S%H1438><s%> va-'eg-Da' Then I cut asunder אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַקְלִ֣י <S%H4731><s%> mak-Li staff הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, mine other אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַחֹֽבְלִ֑ים <S%H2256><s%> ha-choe-Lim; band לְהָפֵר֙ <S%H6565><s%> le-ha-Fer that I might break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאַחֲוָ֔ה <S%H264><s%> ha-'a-cha-Vah, the brotherhood בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah between Judah וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. and Israel ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- unto me Take לְךָ֔ le-Cha, כְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Li unto thee yet the instruments רֹעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh shepherd אֱוִלִֽי׃ <S%H196><s%> 'e-vi-Li. of a foolish

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- behold אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מֵקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> me-Kim For lo I will raise up רֹעֶ֜ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh a shepherd בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, in the land הַנִּכְחָד֤וֹת <S%H3582><s%> han-nich-cha-Dot those that be cut off לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- who will not יִפְקֹד֙ <S%H6485><s%> yif-Kod [which] shall not visit הַנַּ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar babe לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> ye-vak-Kesh, neither shall seek וְהַנִּשְׁבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H7665><s%> ve-han-nish-Be-ret that that is broken לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יְרַפֵּ֑א <S%H7495><s%> ye-rap-Pe; nor heal הַנִּצָּבָה֙ <S%H5324><s%> han-nitz-tza-Vah that that standeth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or יְכַלְכֵּ֔ל <S%H3557><s%> ye-chal-Kel, nor feed וּבְשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-Sar the flesh הַבְּרִיאָה֙ <S%H1277><s%> hab-be-ri-'Ah of the fat יֹאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal, still but he shall eat וּפַרְסֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H6541><s%> u-far-sei-Hen their claws יְפָרֵֽק׃ <S%H6561><s%> ye-fa-Rek. in pieces ס sa-Mek

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe רֹעִ֤י <S%H7473><s%> ro-'I shepherd הָֽאֱלִיל֙ <S%H457><s%> ha-'e-Lil to the idol עֹזְבִ֣י <S%H5800><s%> 'o-ze-Vi that leaveth הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, the flock חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev the sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- will be on זְרוֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'O [shall be] upon his arm וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> 'ein eye יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No; and upon his right זְרֹעוֹ֙ <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'O his arm יָב֣וֹשׁ <S%H3001><s%> ya-Voosh shall be clean תִּיבָ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ti-Vash, dried up וְעֵ֥ין <S%H5869><s%> ve-'Ein eye יְמִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-No and his right כָּהֹ֥ה <S%H3543><s%> ka-Hoh shall be utterly תִכְהֶֽה׃ <S%H3543><s%> tich-Heh. darkened ס sa-Mek
